#summary Example: HeapOutOfBounds
{{{
int main(int argc, char **argv) {
  int *array = new int[100];
  int res = array[argc + 100];  // BOOM
  delete [] array;
  return res;
}
}}}
{{{
clang++ -O1 -fasan example_HeapOutOfBounds.cc
./a.out
}}}
